name: Rebellion Corporation
description:
During the space reclamation project, which was carried out as a national solidarity, an accident caused by an AI runaway threatened the survival of all mankind, and mankind had no choice but to escape from terraformed planets in hastily made ark spaceships.
In a situation where everything for survival is lacking, you must run away by mining the resources of a robot-dominated planet to maintain the system of the ark.



You decide how fast and how much to gather, and the controlled robot smartly does the rest.
But be careful. If you reach your gathering goal too slowly, or if you are too greedy and try to gather large quantities, your base will be at risk.



Various modules are built in advance according to the strategy decided by the player, and when the player starts playing, he focuses on the micro-control of the combat unit above all else.
Resource gathering and defense of turrets are automatic, but not everything is smooth, so elite crews are brought in.

Elite crews on missions are extremely versatile. They are armed with various combat skills, but can also gather resources and repair buildings.
Depending on the player's control, you can put the crew in the role that is lacking!


What is the target amount of resources to gather?
How long should I defend?
What quest shall I do together?
What crew will I be with?
You can decide everything about the content of the mission.

Features

  • Units armed with unique stories and skills
  • A story of intertwined interests of various groups in front of the crisis of humanity
  • Various types of bases for each planet
  • Various construction modules such as gathering/storage/combat/special functions, etc.
  • Planets, diverse environments in multiple universes
  • An ark where you can equip bases and modules and hire crew members with the rewards you get from completing missions.
